name: Villa Di Valletta
description: A cozy, family-owned Italian spot in Albany known for its authentic pasta dishes and warm ambiance, perfect for a comforting meal.

name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant Mexican eatery specializing in tacos and tequila, offering bold flavors and a lively atmosphere for taco enthusiasts.

name: The Cuckoo's Nest
description: A Southern-inspired gem with a creative twist, serving up fried chicken and biscuits with a side of cozy charm.

name: Iron Gate Cafe
description: A beloved breakfast spot in a historic building, known for hearty brunches and a welcoming, eclectic vibe.

name: Villa Valenti
description: A long-standing Italian restaurant near Albany, celebrated for its classic dishes and family-friendly environment.

name: Kuma Ani
description: A modern Japanese spot offering sushi and unique fusion rolls, blending traditional flavors with innovative flair.

name: The Olde English Pub
description: A historic pub with British charm, serving fish and chips alongside local craft beers in a cozy downtown setting.

name: El Loco Mexican Cafe
description: A funky, local Mexican cafe with killer tacos and margaritas, loved for its casual vibe and bold flavors.

name: Druthers Brewing Company
description: A regional brewpub with hearty comfort food, house-brewed beers, and occasional live music events in a rustic space.

name: Sukhothai
description: A Lark Street staple for authentic Thai cuisine, offering spicy curries and noodles in a laid-back, colorful setting.
